item.title: Kubens and Kubectx
item.description: Kubectx helps you switch between clusters. Then there is kubens which helps you switch easily between namespaces.

item.title: SSH Config File
item.description: How to use ssh config file to simplify connecting to ssh without the need of remembering host IP addresses. Simple feature that may or may not help a lot.
